data.marketing-page-about-title: Об andcards - кто мы и чем занимаемся | andcards
data.marketing-page-about-description: andcards - это то, как люди бронируют, платят и общаются в коворкингах. Именно так коворкинг-пространства становятся цифровыми продуктами, которые живут в карманах своих резидентов.
data.marketing-page-about-journey-description: andcards was founded by Igor and Ross in Seoul. Working at a coworking space, they discovered the opportunity and demand, and embarked on a journey of making coworking space more cool and efficient.
data.marketing-page-about-journey-step3: Backed by leading accelerators in Korea, Poland, and {chileUrl}
data.marketing-page-about-journey-step4-link: Launched service in Europe with Stripe
data.marketing-page-about-mission-description: andcards is a technology company that makes apps for coworking spaces. Workspaces of every size — from independent to multi-branch networks — use our coworking software solution to manage their businesses online.
data.marketing-page-about-mission-title: Мы делаем коворкинги более крутыми и эффективными
data.marketing-page-about-stats-title: From small coworking to large networks
data.marketing-page-about-stats-description: andcards helps coworking spaces start, grow and run their online business.
data.marketing-page-about-team-description: andcards is headquartered in Gdańsk, with offices in Seoul and Santiago. Посмотрите как функционирует наша компания в {handbookUrl}.
data.marketing-page-about-team-position-rm-la: Продажи и поддержка клиентов - Латинская Америка
